description.title: About
description.descriptions: SAP Commerce Cloud is a comprehensive, market-leading commerce platform that includes product content management, experience management, personalization, and order management. SAP Commerce Cloud will help B2B, B2C and B2B2C businesses to thrive in today's digital economy.

items.label: Central extensibility in SAP Cloud Platform Extension factory
Real-time personalization and marketing with Content Driven Services add-on
Sell products on Amazon, Facebook, Google Shopping and 1500 other sales channels by connecting SAP Product Content Hub
